      Sets up the test environment before each test.

    • testPlayerJoiningAndInitialization

      @Test void testPlayerJoiningAndInitialization()
      Tests player joining and initialization process.

    • testMatchAlreadyFullException

      @Test void testMatchAlreadyFullException()
      Tests that MatchAlreadyFullException is thrown when adding more players than the maximum allowed.

    • testPlayerColorSelection

      @Test void testPlayerColorSelection()
      Tests player color selection process.

    • testPlayerColorAlreadySelectedException

      @Test void testPlayerColorAlreadySelectedException()
      Tests that InitalChoiceAlreadySetException is thrown when a player tries to reselect a color.

    • testPlayerColorAlreadyPickedException

      @Test void testPlayerColorAlreadyPickedException()
      Tests that ColorAlreadyPickedException is thrown when a player tries to select an already picked color.

    • testInitialStepSwitchFromInitialCardToQuestCard

      @Test void testInitialStepSwitchFromInitialCardToQuestCard()
      Tests the switch from the initial card face selection step to the quest card selection step.

    • testInitialStepSwitchFromQuestCardToPlay

      @Test void testInitialStepSwitchFromQuestCardToPlay()
      Tests the switch from the quest card selection step to the play phase.

    • testWrongInitialStepException

      @Test void testWrongInitialStepException()
      Tests the WrongInitialStepException scenario. Ensures the match controller throws the correct exception when methods are called out of the expected order.

    • testWrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException

      @Test void testWrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException()
      Tests the WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException scenario. Ensures the match controller throws the correct exception when a non-current player attempts to take a turn.

    • testWrongTurnStepException

      @Test void testWrongTurnStepException()
      Tests the WrongTurnStepException scenario. Ensures the match controller throws the correct exception when a player attempts an action outside of their turn step.

    • testSendBroadcastMessage

      @Test void testSendBroadcastMessage()
      Tests the broadcasting message functionality. Ensures the broadcast message is correctly sent and received.

    • setupInitialPhase

      void setupInitialPhase()
      Sets up the initial phase for the match. Adds players, sets their colors, initial card faces, and quest cards.

    • testRemoveLobbyPlayer

      @Test void testRemoveLobbyPlayer()
      Tests if removing a lobby player works as expected. This test adds two players to the lobby and then removes one, verifying the size of the lobby players list and the remaining player.

      @Test void testAddPlayer()
      Tests adding players to the lobby. This test adds two players and verifies the size of the lobby players list.
